Draft: Number One Factor to NLNM

/ > notes > 2024


Created: 9/25/2024

To be released: Dec 4th, 2024

1. Impartial digest of 3 most deadly and mutilating armed conflicts in the world.

2. Update 9/26/2024 NLNM is a system of controlled violence in war that prevents lethality, mutilation and serious injury. There are key factors that allow to achieve and maintain this system. These factors can be used on all levels and stages of implementation. The first in order of identification and importance factor to NLNM is seeing human in the opponent, over/overriding the velocity, direction and number of their vectors of development, or any other factors. Enforcing this factor needs to start with higher command to maintain strategic direction and discipline.
